availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Hart County, Kentucky, merchant. New York native. Married to Mary Brownfield in Hardin County, Kentucky on October 15, 1842. Married to Elizabeth O. Sympson in Taylor County, Kentucky, on March 15, 1853. Merchant in Hart County, Kentucky, in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hart County, Hammonsville, p. 861.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Hart County Marriages, Film 000390788.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Taylor County Marriages, Film 000983727, p. X.
"Joshua Chase (1810-1884) Find A Grave, Memorial 83102772, accessed November 18, 2022, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/83102772.
